item_reports.description: wood elf [WELF], weight 10, walking capacity 5, moves 2 hexes per month. This race may study lumberjack [LUMB], longbow [LBOW], entertainment [ENTE], carpenter [CARP], fishing [FISH] and cooking [COOK] to level 5 and all other skills to level 2.
item_reports.name: wood elf
